tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had consulted Dr. Abhijit for Cervical Spondylosis and shooting pain in arms. He is very good.  He heard all my history with patience and explained details about Spondylosis and how it should be addressed. He made me feel comfortable and at ease and provided treatment plan. 

Thanks a lot Dr. Abhijit, you are too good.

Doctor examined my knee and suggested for MRI. After MRI he explained that ACL reconstruction surgery is required. I was asking questions related to surgery and doctor was not friendly and do not have patience. ** ****** ** * *** *** **** I lost my confidence on hospital itself. I do not recommend this doctor.
